value.name: Everything We Know About The Oklahoma Law Enforcement Killing Of Eric Harris
value.description: Eric Courtney Harris, 44, was the subject of an undercover ... Harris’ brother Andre was vocal in demanding that police release any footage of the shooting. “I want to know if he had a weapon ...

value.name: Criminal charges difficult to prove against police officers, but moving forward in Tulsa
value.description: On Monday the Tulsa County District Attorney charged the 73-year-old Robert Bates with second-degree manslaughter involving culpable negligence for the April 2nd shooting of Eric Courtney Harris.
